name: Krookodile
author: Shiburingaru
flavor_text: This Pokémon is known as the Bully of the Sands. Krookodile’s mighty jaws can bite through heavy plates of iron with almost no effort at all.

abilities.name: Bully of the Sands
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may discard a random card from your opponent’s hand. If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent’s attack, you may discard a random card from your opponent’s hand.

attacks.name: Double-Edge
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.
